meanings.definition: The duties or responsibilities of a butler.
meanings.sent1: The butleries included serving meals and keeping the house tidy.
meanings.sent2: The grand estate required a team to handle the butleries efficiently.
meanings.sent3: The butleries were so overwhelming that the butler accidentally served breakfast for dinner.
meanings.sent4: The butleries weighed on his shoulders like a heavy burden.
meanings.sent5: The butleries demanded precision and grace in every task.

meanings.definition: The service or work performed by a butler.
meanings.sent1: His butleries involved polishing silver and attending to guests.
meanings.sent2: The butleries at the mansion were known for their exceptional quality.
meanings.sent3: The butleries were so impeccable that guests felt like royalty.
meanings.sent4: His butleries were like a well-choreographed dance of hospitality.
meanings.sent5: The butleries added an air of sophistication to the household.

meanings.definition: The household staff managed by a butler.
meanings.sent1: The butleries under his command were skilled and dedicated.
meanings.sent2: The manor's butleries worked together seamlessly to maintain order.
meanings.sent3: The butleries gossiped amongst themselves when the master was away.
meanings.sent4: The butleries were the backbone of the household, keeping everything running smoothly.
meanings.sent5: The butleries were like a well-oiled machine, each member playing a vital role.
